page.title: 08Ysgol Gymraeg Pontybrenin.
page.content: Ysgol Gymraeg Pontybrenin is one of the nine Welsh schools in West Glamorgan.Unlike the village school the children that come to our school come from a lot of different villages around the area.All the children are there because their parents chose the school.The parents especially want their children to be able to speak,to write,and to read well in the Welsh language. The school is organised into three parts.The Nursery classes,the infants,and the juniors.Children can begin school when they are 3yrs old and they leave to attend the new Welsh Language secondary school,'Bro Gwyr' when they are 11 years of age. A special part of the school is to compete in the Urdd.Every Tuesday afternoon a branch of the Urdd is ran by teachers after school.{
